list.name: Default
list.comment: First pass at arnold render integration. Needs some setup as explained in the core.py Need to remove hard coded paths

task.summary: Default task
DiceRoller Class take one
Adds pylab graphing
Fixed typo actic -> arctic PEP8 syntax corrections added __main__ function for Map and DiceRoller classes
Added main function for testing shit out
Added Player class, with BlackGoat subclass Relocated unit.py into module Unit changed enums to use strings, for reporting clarity added zone to Unit class
merged unit.py changes from master
Changed monsters to units

Merge branch 'master' of codebasehq.com:mountains-of-madness/azathoth/cthulhuwars into martinez
# Conflicts: # cthulhuwars/Unit/core.py

Committing to martinez before merging to master
new class layout as proposed 'new style' classes using super() for inheritance

Merge branch 'master' of codebasehq.com:mountains-of-madness/azathoth/cthulhuwars into martinez
# Conflicts: # cthulhuwars/Unit/core.py
small stuff

Merge branch 'master' of codebasehq.com:mountains-of-madness/azathoth/cthulhuwars into martinez
# Conflicts: # cthulhuwars/Unit/core.py
simple subclasses for factions
attempt to merge martinez back to master
Board class creates map and players with properly linked zones
Board class creates map and players with properly linked zones, finds candidate moves
2 move actions per unit are attempted
reset the candidate moves array dingus
modified unit class name mangling board tests summoning actions, only blackgoat implements it shub niggurath summoning and combat power logic added various cultist management methods.
set shub-nigg in play flag dummah
Cleaned up stat reporting. listing units, state, combat power and location
tints nodes in show_map according to occupancy todo: lock placement of nodes
more random playout summoning and movement logic applied to black goat and cthulhu board now tests multiple game rounds with random summon or move actions on a turn, including summoning GOO'a
fixed unit inventory methods
new color class for easier manipulations, less redundant code refactored Black Goat and Cthulhu
Fix summoning logic to prevent infinite loop
Added pdf docs, cos I lose them all the time updated show map to write out a sequence of pngs into the img directory showing the play progress
Capture logic, and listing of all possible actions
Adds more find_possible actions methods fixes error in movement accounting, caused for more moves than power allotted
gather_power_phase shifts player list according to new first player mechanics

First pass at arnold render integration. Needs some setup as explained in the core.py Need to remove hard coded paths in texture search sting change Board/init from render_map to show_map to remove ass file generation
Renders images properly instances spheres for each unit
factions can build and capture now moved all the action decisions into Player class
gates cost 3
Adds the cthulhu mini obj file uses a dictionary syntax to define objects in the Unit class capture logic fixed, stupid monsters kept capturing their own cultists
This fixes a lot of flawed action logic, generalizes summon_action
fix index list problem on action selection
action decision logic removing while loop which sucks
fleshed out yellow sign a bit more
